about_the_game:
NOTE: This DLC is primarily for our fellow dwarves who wish to support The Mermaid MenZ developer's small team to continue supporting Bronzebeard's Tavern and support their future game titles!

The Dwarves are ready for battle, to defend Bronzebeard's Tavern! 🏹

The Dwarven Warriors Mini Pack gives your dwarves a fierce, battle-ready look with rugged armor and sturdy helms built for the toughest fights. Whether you're holding the line or just looking to show off some dwarven pride, these skins are all about strength and grit. Gear up and protect the tavern like the true warrior you are!

Dwarven Warriors Mini Pack Content

  • 4x Exclusive Cosmetics

    • Dwarven Winged Helmet

    • Dwarven Warden Helmet

    • Dwarven Warrior Crown

    • Dwarven Hooded Helmet

  • 1x Exclusive Skin

    • Dwarven Uniform

short_description: The Dwarven Warriors Mini Pack offers striking cosmetic skins with rugged armor, sturdy helms, and fierce aesthetics. Perfect for those who want to display the strength and resilience of a true dwarven warrior, while adding a touch of battle-ready style to their look.
